mainText:
I remember every time that Steve did a presentation, how I sat in the 
Apple store and didn't want to miss a word. As a former athlete turned journalist, Apple product has meant the world to me. Never will there be 
another person to give us as a whole so much. Steve will always be what 
Apple stands for - a life cut short but he gave us so much. Thank you. 
Today is a sad day in the world. He was truly the icon of many 
generations - the Beatles of life! Thanks for iTune, the iPad, iPad and 
Mac!
author: Andre
